aCar.name: admin_admin
aCar.desc: Go through the different admin panels.

aCar.name: admin_buy
aCar.desc: Open the GM Shop panel, or the associated BuyList.

aCar.name: admin_camera
aCar.desc: Toggle the CameraMode.

aCar.name: admin_gmlist
aCar.desc: Toggle you from /gmlist results.

aCar.name: admin_gmoff
aCar.desc: Toggle off your GM status, 1min by default.

aCar.name: admin_help
aCar.desc: Open this panel.

aCar.name: admin_link
aCar.desc: Open the proper admin htm.

aCar.name: admin_msg
aCar.desc: Send the associated SystemMessage id.

aCar.name: admin_show
aCar.desc: Show visual paths. For html, show the complete folder.

aCar.name: admin_announce
aCar.desc: Open the Announcements panel.

aCar.name: admin_ann
aCar.desc: Broadcast the message, with 'Announcements:' tag.

aCar.name: admin_say
aCar.desc: Broadcast the message.

aCar.name: admin_gmchat
aCar.desc: Broadcast the message to all GMs.

aCar.name: admin_bk
aCar.desc: Open the Bookmark panel or register a new Bookmark.

aCar.name: admin_delbk
aCar.desc: Delete the associated Bookmark.

aCar.name: admin_ch
aCar.desc: Open the Clan Hall panel.

aCar.name: admin_cw
aCar.desc: Open the Cursed Weapons panel.

aCar.name: admin_open
aCar.desc: Open the Door set as parameter/target.

aCar.name: admin_close
aCar.desc: Close the Door set as parameter/target.

aCar.name: admin_debug
aCar.desc: Similar to //info for Players.

aCar.name: admin_party_info
aCar.desc: Show selected Player's Party infos.

aCar.name: admin_remove
aCar.desc: Remove the penalty from the selected target.

aCar.name: admin_set
aCar.desc: Set the value to the selected target.

aCar.name: admin_abnormal
aCar.desc: Affect your target (or you) with the abnormal effect.

aCar.name: admin_atmosphere
aCar.desc: Broadcast the given sky to everyone logged in.

aCar.name: admin_earthquake
aCar.desc: Broadcast an Earthquake effect to everyone logged in.

aCar.name: admin_effect
aCar.desc: Add/remove a buff to/from selected Creature.

aCar.name: admin_gmspeed
aCar.desc: Affect you with the GM Haste skill.

aCar.name: admin_hide
aCar.desc: Toggle your hide state.

aCar.name: admin_invul
aCar.desc: Toggle your invincible state - effects are denied.

aCar.name: admin_jukebox
aCar.desc: Open the jukebox panel.

aCar.name: admin_para
aCar.desc: Paralyze on/off your target.

aCar.name: admin_play_sound
aCar.desc: >Broadcast the associated client music.

aCar.name: admin_social
aCar.desc: Affect your target (or you) with the social animation.

aCar.name: admin_undying
aCar.desc: Toggle your immortal state - leave you at 1 HP.

aCar.name: admin_enchant
aCar.desc: Enchant your target's item slot.

aCar.name: admin_find
aCar.desc: Find Player(s) based on account/name/ip.

aCar.name: admin_list
aCar.desc: List all Players, 1 page for 20 results.

aCar.name: admin_info
aCar.desc: Provide informations of your target.

aCar.name: admin_item
aCar.desc: Create an Item for the selected Player.

aCar.name: admin_geo
aCar.desc: Run one of the geoengine related checks.

aCar.name: admin_path
aCar.desc: Run one of the pathfinding related checks.

aCar.name: admin_knownlist
aCar.desc: Show the knownlist of the selected target.

aCar.name: admin_server
aCar.desc: Run one of the server related commands.

aCar.name: admin_cancel
aCar.params: [name[radius]] - by default, your target or you
aCar.desc: Cancel all buffs from Creature(s).

aCar.name: admin_heal
aCar.params: [name[radius]] - by default, your target or you
aCar.desc: Heal Creature(s).

aCar.name: admin_kill
aCar.params: [name[radius]] - by default, your target or you
aCar.desc: Kill Creature(s).

aCar.name: admin_res
aCar.params: [name[radius]] - by default, your target or you
aCar.desc: Resurrect Creature(s).

aCar.name: admin_manor
aCar.desc: Open the Manor panel.

aCar.name: admin_movie
aCar.desc: Open the Movie Maker panel.

aCar.name: admin_sequence
aCar.desc: Manipulate a Movie Maker's Sequence.

aCar.name: admin_petition
aCar.desc: Open the Petition panel.

aCar.name: admin_force_peti
aCar.desc: Force your target to enter in Petition mode with you.

aCar.name: admin_add_peti_chat
aCar.desc: Add your target to your active Petition.

aCar.name: admin_pledge
aCar.desc: Affect your target's Clan.

aCar.name: admin_polymorph
aCar.desc: Polymorph on/off your target (Player or Npc) into a Npc.

aCar.name: admin_ban
aCar.desc: Punish the Player or Account for the given duration.

aCar.name: admin_jail
aCar.desc: Jail the Player for the given duration.

aCar.name: admin_kick
aCar.desc: Kick all non-GMs Players, or the Player name/target.

aCar.name: admin_unban
aCar.desc: Lift the punishment.

aCar.name: admin_unjail
aCar.desc: Lift the jail punishment.

aCar.name: admin_reload
aCar.desc: Reload the proper system. Can be stacked.

aCar.name: admin_siege
aCar.desc: Run one of the siege related commands.

aCar.name: admin_castle
aCar.desc: Run one of the castle related commands.

aCar.name: admin_clan_skill
aCar.desc: Add/remove a Clan skill to/from selected Player.

aCar.name: admin_skill
aCar.desc: Add/remove a skill to/from selected Player.

aCar.name: admin_ride
aCar.desc: Ride the associated mount. Most checks are undone.

aCar.name: admin_unride
aCar.desc: Force dismount your mount.

aCar.name: admin_unsummon
aCar.desc: Unsummon the targeted Summon.

aCar.name: admin_target
aCar.desc: Target the specified Player.

aCar.name: admin_instant_move
aCar.desc: Teleport you on mouse click (0 stop, 1 once, 2 forever).

aCar.name: admin_recall
aCar.desc: Recall the Player (can be also Party / Clan) to you.

aCar.name: admin_sendhome
aCar.desc: Send the Player (name, target or you) to nearest town.

aCar.name: admin_tele
aCar.desc: Open the Teleport panel.

aCar.name: admin_teleport
aCar.desc: Teleport you to coords. If no Z is set, calculate it.

aCar.name: admin_teleportto
aCar.desc: Teleport you to the Player.

aCar.name: admin_test
aCar.desc: Used to easily craft commands for debug purpose.

aCar.name: admin_zone
aCar.desc: Show the zone panel, or the zone visually.
